com.mdc.combot

Class ComBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mdc.combot.ComBot

  • public class ComBot
extends java.lang.Object
    ComBot class. The purpose of the ComBot, or Community Bot, is to be able to combine features from other bots into a single instance.
    Author:
    xDestx

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ComBot(java.lang.String botToken)
      Initialize a new ComBot with the provided token.

      • ComBot

        public ComBot(java.lang.String botToken)
        Initialize a new ComBot with the provided token. The bot still needs to be logged in.
        Parameters:
        botToken - The bot user token

      • setBot

        public static boolean setBot(ComBot b)
        Set the current bot. If the bot is already set, this will fail. The current bot must be shutdown first.
        Parameters:
        b - The bot to set
        Returns:
        True, if the bot could be set

      • getBot

        public static ComBot getBot()
        Get the current ComBot running. If there is no bot running, it will return null.
        Returns:
        A bot instance or null
